publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1813 Peter Peacock: School Education (Ministerial Powers and Independent Schools) (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the School Education (Ministerial Powers and Independent Schools) (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Euan Robson*

S2M-1813 Peter Peacock: School Education (Ministerial Powers and Independent Schools) (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the School Education (Ministerial Powers and Independent Schools) (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Euan Robson
